name: 互联网大亨 Internet tycoon
description:
Name your company and start your very first business!



Be a good boss, hire talents with the most reasonable salary during the interview, and build the startup team!




Your employees have needs or ideas when working, keep them in a good mood!

Cultivate employees and make everyone a boss

Everyone has the ambition to advance their career. Train your employees and raise their stats.




A website needs server! Buy server rooms in various cities and regions; keep them running but not overheating!



Don't do it for free! With enough users, your website will generate lots of page views. Don't let them go to waste; sign advertisement contracts for considerable income. The more the merrier! But too many ads will also lower user satisfaction. It's up to you to keep the balance.
